mapper.select: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RN, r.TLSN_NO,S.ID,S.PAY,S.REG_DATE,R.REQ_DATE,R.CONTENT,R.RF_ST_CODE,L.TTL, L.LT_NO ,COUNT(*) OVER() COUNT FROM SUGANG S JOIN REFUND R ON S.TLSN_NO = R.TLSN_NO JOIN LECTURE L ON L.LT_NO = S.LT_NO ORDER BY R.TLSN_NO DESC) WHERE RN <=10*(#{page}+1) AND RN >=(10*#{page})+1 AND TTL LIKE '%'||#{ttlSearchKey}||'%' AND CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{contentSearchKey}||'%' AND ID LIKE '%'||#{idSearchKey}||'%'

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RN, r.TLSN_NO,s.id,s.pay,s.reg_date,r.req_date,r.content,r.rf_st_code,l.ttl, l.lt_no ,COUNT(*) OVER() COUNT FROM SUGANG S JOIN REFUND R ON S.TLSN_NO = R.TLSN_NO JOIN LECTURE L ON L.LT_NO = S.LT_NO ORDER BY R.TLSN_NO DESC) WHERE RN <=10*(#{page}+1) AND RN >=(10*#{page})+1 AND rf_st_code LIKE'%'||#{rfStCode}||'%'

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RN, r.TLSN_NO,S.ID,S.PAY,S.REG_DATE,R.REQ_DATE,R.CONTENT,R.RF_ST_CODE,L.TTL, L.LT_NO,U.NAME,S.ADDR,S.ZIP,S.DETA_ADDR,COUNT(*) OVER() length FROM SUGANG S JOIN REFUND R ON S.TLSN_NO = R.TLSN_NO JOIN LECTURE L ON L.LT_NO = S.LT_NO JOIN USERS U ON U.ID = S.ID where 1=1 ORDER BY R.TLSN_NO DESC)
where rn > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount} and rn <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}
